task.objective: Research onboarding data needs for Sibling
task.sub_context: Sibling collects volunteered data during onboarding (e.g., interests, goals). We use Node.js, TypeScript, MongoDB, and React. Aim for a comprehensive yet user-friendly data set.
task.deliverable: A JSON list of 5-10 volunteered data fields (e.g., goals, location, profession) with descriptions, suggested input methods (e.g., dropdown, checkbox, text), and why they’re valuable.
task.notes: Balance completeness with usability—consider external API integration for prepopulated options.

data_fields.name: Interests
data_fields.description: User’s hobbies or topics of interest (e.g., tech, fitness, music).
data_fields.why_valuable: Enables personalized content and AI recommendations. Prepopulate options via external taxonomy APIs (e.g., Wikipedia, Google Knowledge Graph).

data_fields.name: Primary Goal
data_fields.description: Main objective for using Sibling (e.g., productivity, health, learning).
data_fields.why_valuable: Guides AI assistant focus and prioritization. Predefined options ensure simplicity and consistency.

data_fields.name: Location
data_fields.description: User’s city or region (e.g., New York, NY).
data_fields.why_valuable: Contextualizes data (e.g., weather, local events) for AI insights. Integrate with Google Places API for prepopulated suggestions.

data_fields.name: Profession
data_fields.description: User’s job or industry (e.g., software developer, healthcare).
data_fields.why_valuable: Tailors AI support to work-related needs. Prepopulate via LinkedIn API or industry lists.

data_fields.name: Preferred Communication Style
data_fields.description: How user likes to receive info (e.g., concise, detailed, visual).
data_fields.why_valuable: Customizes AI interaction style for user comfort and engagement.

data_fields.name: Daily Availability
data_fields.description: Times user is free for tasks (e.g., mornings, evenings).
data_fields.why_valuable: Optimizes AI scheduling and reminders based on user routine.

data_fields.name: Fitness Level
data_fields.description: Self-reported activity level (e.g., beginner, intermediate, advanced).
data_fields.why_valuable: Supports health-related AI features and integration with fitness trackers.

data_fields.name: Learning Style
data_fields.description: Preferred way to learn (e.g., visual, auditory, kinesthetic).
data_fields.why_valuable: Enhances AI-driven educational recommendations and content delivery.
